Subject: Thanks for dinner last night!

Hi [Name],

It was so lovely catching up and having dinner with you last night! The food was delicious, and I really enjoyed our conversation. Thanks again for your hospitality.

Best regards,

Subject: Following Up on Last Night's Dinner

Dear [Name],

It was a pleasure having dinner with you last night. I enjoyed the excellent food and our conversation immensely. Thank you for your gracious hospitality.

Sincerely,

[Sender]
